title: Upcoming Guidance for First Lady Michelle Obama | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
April 27, 2016

 



Upcoming Guidance for First Lady Michelle Obama





Thursday, April 28th

The White House * 7:00PM ET – The First Lady will join the President to mark Passover at the annual Seder Dinner with friends and staff.

	 

Friday, April 29th 

The White House * 11:00AM ET – As part of the International Jazz Day celebration at the White House, the First Lady will welcome high school students from across the Washington D.C. area for the History of Jazz Student Workshop. The program will feature Herbie Hancock, Dee Dee Bridgewater, Bobby Watson, Terrence Blanchard, master jazz students from UCLA and members from the Thelonious Monk Institute. Mrs. Obama will deliver brief remarks to introduce the workshop.
